amendment.description: Amendments increase funding for International Disaster and Famine Assistance by $50 million and funding for Migration and Refugee Assistance by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of two amendments offered en bloc to increase disaster and famine assistance by $50 million and to increase migrations and refugee assistance by $50 million.

action.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (IL) amendments (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
